metadata.title: CVE-2023-4353 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in ANGLE in Google Chrome prior to 116.0.5845.96allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
